verses.text:
\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \add him\add*, O ye \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Ye that \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; for \add it is\add* \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* unto himself, \add and\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for his peculiar \w treasure|strong="H5459"\w*.

For I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and \add that\add* our \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* \add is\add* above all \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Whatsoever the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w*, \add that\add* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and in \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, in the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, and all deep \w places|strong="H8415"\w*.

He causeth the \w vapours|strong="H5387"\w* to \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; he \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w* for the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*; he \w bringeth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* out of his \w treasuries|strong="H0214"\w*.

Who \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, both of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.\f + \fr 135.8 \ft both…: Heb. from man unto beast\f*

\add Who\add* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w tokens|strong="H0226"\w* and \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee, O \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and upon all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.
Who \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*;

\w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*:

And \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add for\add* an \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*, an \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; \add and\add* thy \w memorial|strong="H2143"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, throughout \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.  +  r 135.13  t throughout…: Heb. to generation and generation *

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and he will \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* himself concerning his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

The \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* \add are\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.
They have \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, but they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* not; \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have they, but they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not;
They have \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, but they \w hear|strong="H0238"\w* not; neither is \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \add any\add* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* in their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*.
They that \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them are like unto them: \add so is\add* every one that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in them.

\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*:

\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*: ye that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* be the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, which \w dwelleth|strong="H7931"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.
